Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Aza patients had significantly more staphylococcal infections than all other transplant groups ( P less than 0 . 005 ) , and systemic fungal infections occurred only in the liver transplant group .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease          |
|------------------|
| Staphylococcal infections |
| Systemic fungal infections |

In the given paragraph, the two diseases mentioned are "staphylococcal infections" and "systemic fungal infections".

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Aza patients had significantly more staphylococcal infections than all other transplant groups ( P less than 0 . 005 ) , and systemic fungal infections occurred only in the liver transplant group .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Staphylococcal infections (caused by Staphylococcus bacteria) |
| Systemic fungal infections |

Note: No specific chemical names are mentioned in the paragraph, only the types of infections caused by microorganisms.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Staphylococcal infections (caused by Staphylococcus bacteria) |

Note: Systemic fungal infections are not a chemical entity, but a type of infection caused by fungi. Therefore, it was not included in the table.
